text:
Hey all!
I'm working with CRM exports right now.
I'm searching for an option to get in the CSV header the actual field ids I was using to start export except names of those fields.
eg. I'm requesting for
`email,hs_object_id,hs_lead_status,lastmodifieddate`
but in CSV as an output I'm getting
`"Record ID","Email","Lead Status","Last Modified Date","Create Date"`
which IMO seems to be inconsistent.
Any tips? :pray:

Hey All, Hope you are doing well!

I  am creating a landing page and wanna to add footer but it's not allowing me.
Is there there any way to do so?

Thanks in advance,
Afzal Akhtar
